storeodr_t1, storeodr."year" storeodr_year, storeodr.subject storeodr_subject, storeodr.op storeodr_op, storeodr.text storeodr_text, storeodr.form storeodr_form, storeodr.formargs storeodr_formargs, storeodr."length" storeodr_length, storeodr.sum_qty storeodr_sum_qty, storeodr.sum_amount storeodr_sum_amount from tranodr a left join lily."user" op on a.op = op.id left join lily."group" ownerGroup on a.gid = ownerGroup.id left join lily."user" ownerUser on a.uid = ownerUser.id left join tranodr prev on a.prev = prev.id left join lily._form form on a.form = form.id left join lily.org shipper on a.shipper = shipper.id left join trancat category on a.cat = category.id left join saleodr saleodr on a.saleodr = saleodr.id left join tranphase phase on a.phase = phase.id left join lily."zone" d_zone on a.d_zone = d_zone.id left join lily."zone" s_zone on a.s_zone = s_zone.id left join storeodr storeodr on a.storeodr = storeodr.id

mapper.insert: insert into tranodr( uid, gid, mode, acl, priority, flags, "state", t0, t1, "year", creation, lastmod, "version", subject, op, text, form, formargs, props, cat, phase, prev, saleodr, storeodr, shipper, s_alias, s_ctprops, s_address1, s_address2, s_zone, s_tel, s_telok, s_email, s_emailok, d_alias, d_ctprops, d_address1, d_address2, d_zone, d_tel, d_telok, d_email, d_emailok, shipcost, "length", sum_qty, sum_amount ) values( #{ownerUserId}, #{ownerGroupId}, #{accessMode}, #{acl}, #{priority}, #{flags}, #{state}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{year}, #{creationDate}, #{lastModifiedDate}, #{version}, #{subject}, #{opId}, #{rawText}, #{formId}, #{formArguments}, #{properties.jsonStr}::jsonb, #{categoryId}, #{phaseId}, #{prevId}, #{salesOrderId}, #{storeodrId}, #{shipperId}, #{sAlias}, #{sCtprops.jsonStr}::jsonb, #{sAddress1}, #{sAddress2}, #{sZoneId}, #{sTel}, #{sTelok}, #{sEmail}, #{sEmailok}, #{dAlias}, #{dCtprops.jsonStr}::jsonb, #{dAddress1}, #{dAddress2}, #{dZoneId}, #{dTel}, #{dTelok}, #{dEmail}, #{dEmailok}, #{shipcost}, #{length}, #{totalQuantity}, #{totalAmount} );
mapper.select: select extract(year from t0)::int "year", count(*) "count" from tranodr group by extract(year from t0)::int
